trait.name: Hit Points
text: 5 + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Amphibious
text: The beast can breathe both air and water.

trait.name: Primal Bond
text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

action.name: Binding Strike
text: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 2 + PB piercing damage or 1d6 + 2 + PB bludgeoning damage (your choice), and the target is grappled (escape DC equal to your spellcasting save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target.
